reviewText: These guys are fantastic. My brother had not seen this show, so I got him the set as a Christmas gift one year. Needless to say, he was hooked shortly after watching them.The level of perversity and strange in Sunny really adds to the ambiance, which can at times feel like an acid trip.Also, anything with DeVito is bound to be good for a laugh.They should really put seasons 1-4 on Blu-ray.

reviewText: This was one of the best purchased I've made on Amazon! I bought these years ago and have watched them constantly since. This show is weird, it's dark, it's smart, it's messed up, but more than anything, it's hilarious! If you have never seen this show, drop everything you're doing right now and do it! Don't just keep reading this, go watch this show!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This one of the most insanely funny tv shows of all time! It incorporates the total political incorrectness of"South Park", the willingness to create whole new boundaries, & then trash them, of "Chappelle's Show" with aliberal dose of the best of "The Three Stooges". Many people, including myself, were & are resistant to this showat first, because there is a certain amount of stupidity that is immediately apparent. It is incorporated withvery dry humor, physical comedy that has to seen & acting that is completely convincing in an almost scary way.These characters have no redeeming human qualities at all, along with a complete lack of shame, in the very besttraditions of "Married With Children". There is nothing they won't try to scam, steal, lie about, ingest, pourstale beer on or try to have sex with."Sunny", like almost all of it's excellent fellow FX programming(Rescue Me, The Shield etc.) is for the grown-ups.It's well worth making the investment as the series is coming to Comedy Central who are almost certainly goingto censor it heavily to play in the earlier hours. Hopefully they will play some uncensored episodes in the latenight slots when they play other uncut shows. Trust me, you'll want every bit of that Philly sun shining down onyou! This is now my favorite show to turn people on to, it makes the episodes all the better when someone iswatching them for the first time.

reviewText: this is a review of the box set, not the program (which i think is great).at the time of writing, amazon have this season 1-4 box set priced at $83.99.  why would you pay this much, when there are no additional special features included (or at least, none are listed in amazon's scant product details section) ?you can purchase the individual seasons collectively from amazon for $64.97 (and potentially for less if you buy from marketplace sellers):It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia - Seasons 1 & 2It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia: Season 3Its Always Sunny In Philadelphia: Season 4

reviewText: This is one of the funniest, most original shows I've ever seen. Admittedly not for everyone. If your easily offended, it's not for you. But if you like Family Guy this show is gonna kill you with laughter.And as usual I got an incredible deal from Amazon that I just couldn't pass up.If you are unsure as to wether or not you'll like it head over to HULU and watch an episode or two. You'l be hooked. Then come back here and scoop up this awesome deal.
summary: One of the funniest shows ever.
